18namespace v8 {
19namespace internal {
20
21class MinorGCJob::Task : public CancelableTask {
22 public:
23 Task(Isolate* isolate, MinorGCJob* job)
24 : CancelableTask(isolate), isolate_(isolate), job_(job) {}
25
26 // CancelableTask overrides.
27 void RunInternal() override;
28
29 Isolate* isolate() const { return isolate_; }
30
31 private:
32 Isolate* const isolate_;
33 MinorGCJob* const job_;
34};
35
36size_t MinorGCJob::YoungGenerationTaskTriggerSize(Heap* heap) {
37 size_t young_capacity = 0;
38 if (v8_flags.sticky_mark_bits) {
39 // TODO(333906585): Adjust parameters.
40 young_capacity = heap->sticky_space()->Capacity() -
41 heap->sticky_space()->old_objects_size();
42 } else {
43 young_capacity = heap->new_space()->TotalCapacity();
44 }
45 return young_capacity * v8_flags.minor_gc_task_trigger / 100;
46}
47
48bool MinorGCJob::YoungGenerationSizeTaskTriggerReached(Heap* heap) {
49 if (v8_flags.sticky_mark_bits) {
50 return heap->sticky_space()->young_objects_size() >=
51 YoungGenerationTaskTriggerSize(heap);
52 } else {
53 return heap->new_space()->Size() >= YoungGenerationTaskTriggerSize(heap);
54 }
55}
56
57void MinorGCJob::ScheduleTask() {
58 if (!v8_flags.minor_gc_task) return;
59 if (current_task_id_ != CancelableTaskManager::kInvalidTaskId) return;
60 if (heap_->IsTearingDown()) return;
61 // A task should be scheduled when young generation size reaches the task
62 // trigger, but may also occur before the trigger is reached. For example,
63 // this method is called from the allocation observer for new space. The
64 // observer step size is detemine based on the current task trigger. However,
65 // due to refining allocated bytes after sweeping (allocated bytes after
66 // sweeping may be less than live bytes during marking), new space size may
67 // decrease while the observer step size remains the same.
68 std::shared_ptr<v8::TaskRunner> taskrunner = heap_->GetForegroundTaskRunner();
69 if (taskrunner->NonNestableTasksEnabled()) {
70 std::unique_ptr<Task> task = std::make_unique<Task>(heap_->isolate(), this);
71 current_task_id_ = task->id();
72 taskrunner->PostNonNestableTask(std::move(task));
73 }
74}
75
76void MinorGCJob::CancelTaskIfScheduled() {
77 if (current_task_id_ == CancelableTaskManager::kInvalidTaskId) return;
78 // The task may have ran and bailed out already if major incremental marking
79 // was running, in which `TryAbort` will return `kTaskRemoved`.
80 heap_->isolate()->cancelable_task_manager()->TryAbort(current_task_id_);
81 current_task_id_ = CancelableTaskManager::kInvalidTaskId;
82}
83
84void MinorGCJob::Task::RunInternal() {
85 VMState<GC> state(isolate());
86 TRACE_EVENT_CALL_STATS_SCOPED(isolate(), "v8", "V8.MinorGCJob.Task");
87
88 DCHECK_EQ(job_->current_task_id_, id());
89 job_->current_task_id_ = CancelableTaskManager::kInvalidTaskId;
90
91 Heap* heap = isolate()->heap();
92 if (v8_flags.minor_ms &&
93 isolate()->heap()->incremental_marking()->IsMajorMarking()) {
94 // Don't trigger a MinorMS cycle while major incremental marking is active.
95 return;
96 }
97
98 heap->CollectGarbage(NEW_SPACE, GarbageCollectionReason::kTask);
99}
100
101} // namespace internal
102} // namespace v8
